content.rendered:
With our Fit to Serve series, Team M&F pays homage to the bravery, dedication, and heroism of all the men and women who serve our country as military personnel, firefighters, police officers, and first-responders. Spearheaded and curated by Muscle & Fitness Senior Military Editor MSgt Rob Wilkins, USAF, Ret., the goal of Fit to Serve is to tell the story behind each person’s fitness journey and career, as well as highlight the strategies used to train, eat, and stay motivated.

Workout Routines

Soldier Strong Military Workout

A foundational program that emphasizes recovery and durability.

Read article
